headline: Motorola Solutions Introduces ‘AI Nutrition Labels,’ a First for Public Safety & Enterprise Security Products
summary: CHICAGO, July 25, 2025--Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI) today announced it is introducing ‘AI nutrition labels’ to provide clear, concise information about how artificial intelligence (AI) is used across its safety and security technologies. The initiative is a first for public safety and enterprise security products, helping people understand a product’s core AI "ingredients," just as food nutrition labels were born from a desire to understand dietary intake.
